code:
My Website

  • Home
  • About

Article Title

This is an article.

title: Audio and Video
description: Embed audio and video content.
code:
<audio controls>
  <source src="audio.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
  Your browser does not support the audio element.
</audio>

<video width="320" height="240" controls>
  <source src="movie.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

title: Canvas
description: Use the canvas element to draw graphics.
code:
<canvas id="myCanvas" width="200" height="100" style="border:1px solid #000000;"></canvas>

<script>
var c = document.getElementById("myCanvas");
var ctx = c.getContext("2d");
ctx.moveTo(0, 0);
ctx.lineTo(200, 100);
ctx.stroke();
</script>

title: SVG
description: Use SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) for drawing.
code:
<svg width="100" height="100">
  <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="3" fill="red" />
</svg>

title: Meta Tags
description: Use meta tags to provide metadata about your HTML document.
code:
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="description" content="Free Web tutorials">
  <meta name="keywords" content="HTML, CSS, JavaScript">
  <meta name="author" content="John Doe">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
</head>

title: Responsive Design
description: Create responsive web pages that look good on all devices.
code:
Responsive Design

This container adjusts its width based on the screen size.

title: Comments
description: Add comments in HTML for documentation purposes.
code: <!-- This is a comment. Comments are not displayed in the browser. -->

title: Bold and Italic Text
description: Style text with bold and italic formatting.
code: This is bold and italic text.

title: Horizontal Line
description: Insert a horizontal line in HTML.
code:
Before

After

title: Inline Styles
description: Apply inline styles to HTML elements.
code: This text is styled with inline CSS.

title: Block vs Inline Elements
description: Understand the difference between block and inline HTML elements.
code:
This is a block element. It takes up the full width available.
This is an inline element. It only takes up the necessary width.

title: Dropdown Menu
description: Create a dropdown menu in HTML.
code:
<select>
  <option value="volvo">Volvo</option>
  <option value="saab">Saab</option>
  <option value="mercedes">Mercedes</option>
  <option value="audi">Audi</option>
</select>

description: Use nested HTML elements to create complex structures.
code:
Parent Element

This is the parent paragraph.

title: Checkbox and Radio Buttons
description: Create checkbox and radio button inputs in HTML forms.

title: IFrames
description: Embed content from another webpage using an iframe.
code: <iframe src="https://www.example.com"></iframe>

title: Button Elements
description: Use button elements in HTML forms.
code: <button type="button">Click me</button>

title: Abbreviations
description: Use the <abbr> element for abbreviations and acronyms.
code: WHO is a specialized agency of the United Nations.

title: Superscript and Subscript
description: Use <sup> for superscript and <sub> for subscript text.
code: This is superscript and this is subscript text.

title: Blockquotes
description: Use blockquotes to indicate quoted content.
code: This is a blockquote. It indicates quoted content.

title: Character Entities
description: Use character entities for special characters.
code: © 2024 My Website ®

title: Whitespace and Line Breaks
description: Understand how whitespace and line breaks affect HTML rendering.
code: This text contains line breaks

title: Button Links
description: Create links that look like buttons using HTML.
code: Click me

title: Details and Summary
description: Create collapsible content with the <details> and <summary> elements.
code:
Click to expand

This is hidden content that can be expanded.

title: Datalist and Input
description: Create a dropdown list of predefined options using <datalist> and <input>.
code:
<label for="cars">Choose a car:</label>
<input list="carList" id="cars" name="cars">
<datalist id="carList">
  <option value="Volvo">
  <option value="Saab">
  <option value="Mercedes">
  <option value="Audi">
</datalist>

title: Fieldset and Legend
description: Group related form elements with <fieldset> and add a caption with <legend>.
code: Personal Information

title: Meter Element
description: Use the <meter> element to create a gauge.
code:
<label for="disk_c">Disk usage:</label>
<meter id="disk_c" value="2" min="0" max="10">2 out of 10</meter>

title: Progress Element
description: Display progress of a task with the <progress> element.
code:
<label for="file">File upload progress:</label>
<progress id="file" value="70" max="100">70%</progress>

title: Output Element
description: Display calculation results with the <output> element.
code:
<form oninput="x.value=parseInt(a.value)+parseInt(b.value)">
  <input type="range" id="a" value="50"> +
  <input type="number" id="b" value="50">
  = <output name="x" for="a b">100</output>
</form>

title: Time Element
description: Display dates and times with the <time> element.
code: Meeting time: 9:00 AM

title: Keygen Element
description: Generate and submit public/private key pairs with the <keygen> element.
code:
<form>
  <keygen name="keypair">
  <input type="submit">
</form>

title: Mark Element
description: Highlight text with the <mark> element.
code: Search results: HTML tutorials.

title: Pre Element
description: Preserve formatting and whitespace with the <pre> element.
code:
This   text
  preserves    whitespace.

title: Object Element
description: Embed multimedia content with the <object> element.
code: <object data="movie.mp4" width="320" height="240"></object>

title: Map Element
description: Display an image map with clickable areas using the <map> and <area> elements.

title: Base Element
description: Set the base URL for relative URLs in a document with the <base> element.

title: Script Element
description: Include JavaScript in HTML with the <script> element.
code:
<script>
  document.getElementById("demo").innerHTML = "Hello JavaScript!";
</script>

title: Noscript Element
description: Provide alternative content for browsers that do not support JavaScript with the <noscript> element.
code: This page requires JavaScript to be enabled.

title: Marquee
description: Create a scrolling or moving text or image.
code: <marquee behavior="scroll" direction="left">Scrolling text...</marquee>

title: Meter
description: Define a scalar measurement within a known range.
code: <meter value="5" min="0" max="10">5 out of 10</meter>

title: Progress
description: Represents the completion progress of a task.
code: <progress value="50" max="100">50%</progress>

title: Time
description: Represents a specific period in time or a date.
code: <time datetime="2024-06-27">June 27, 2024</time>

title: Template
description: Defines fragments of HTML that can be cloned and inserted in the document by JavaScript.

title: Figure and Figcaption
description: Groups media content and its caption.

title: Aside
description: Defines content aside from the main content, often used for sidebars or related content.
code:
Related Content

This content is related to the main article.

title: Output
description: Represents the result of a calculation or user action.
code:
<output for="value">Result</output>
<input type="range" id="value" value="50" min="0" max="100">

title: Keygen
description: Used to generate key pairs, typically used in forms to allow the user to securely submit encrypted data.
code: <keygen name="keypair">
